segments.text: I ’ d like to be fitted for a suit please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . Have you decided which material you would like the suit to be made from ? We have a selection of materials over here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I thought that I would choose either this one or that one . I really want a dark blue suit . Which do you recommend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This material is a little more expensive , but is of much higher quality .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I can feel the difference in material . There ’ s not much difference in price . Ok , I ’ ll take the more expensive one .
segments.speaker: S1
